title: Soba Bowl
instructions: Cook soba noodles according to package instructions. Rinse under cold water to stop cooking and prevent sticking. Set aside.
Prepare the dressing: whisk together soy sauce, rice vinegar, sesame oil, mirin, and a touch of maple syrup.
Slice the planted into thin strips and stir-fry in a hot wok with sesame oil until crispy, about 3-4 minutes.
Blanch edamame and prepare toppings: shred red cabbage, julienne carrots, slice cucumber, and chop scallions.
Divide cold soba noodles between bowls. Arrange vegetables and crispy planted on top.
Drizzle generously with the sesame dressing and toss to combine.
Top with toasted sesame seeds, nori strips, and pickled ginger. Serve cold or at room temperature.
